thread.title: 2018 Mercedes-Benz GLA-class Debuts with More Glitz
thread.title_full: 2018 Mercedes-Benz GLA-class Debuts with More Glitz

author: Jens Meiners
title: 2018 Mercedes-Benz GLA-class Debuts with More Glitz
text:
- The GLA-class may not be the prettiest car in the Mercedes-Benz lineup, but it is reasonably successful in terms of sales. The compact crossover shares its platform with the CLA-class and is designed to take on the likes of the Acura RDX, the Audi Q3, the BMW X1, and the Lexus NX. Three years after the GLA’s launch, Mercedes-Benz is unveiling a facelifted model for 2018 that will roll into dealerships by midyear. READ MORE ›› 
-
